${modID}:DeceptionPower.NAME: Deception
DESCRIPTIONS: When receiving unblocked attack damage, apply #b%d #yWeak back.

${modID}:LoseFocusPower.NAME: Focus Down
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of this turn, lose #b%d #yFocus.

${modID}:RetributionPower.NAME: Retribution
DESCRIPTIONS: When attacked, your next attack deals #b%d additional damage.

${modID}:UntappedPower.NAME: Untapped
DESCRIPTIONS: For each unused Energy this turn, draw #b1 additional card next turn.

${modID}:VelvetChokerPower.NAME: Choked
DESCRIPTIONS: You cannot play more than #b6 cards this turn. You have played #b%d.
I can only play up to NL #r6 cards this turn.
